tasks.label: Auto Install Workspace Extensions
tasks.command: code --install-extension subframe7536.theme-maple --install-extension shalldie.background --install-extension janisdd.vscode-edit-csv --install-extension github.copilot --install-extension github.copilot-chat --install-extension stephanoskomnenos.jieba --install-extension ms-toolsai.jupyter --install-extension nexmoe.monitor-pro --install-extension ms-python.vscode-pylance --install-extension ms-python.python --install-extension prasadgk.pythoncodelens --install-extension ms-python.debugpy --install-extension mechatroner.rainbow-csv --install-extension rooveterinaryinc.roo-cline --install-extension charliermarsh.ruff
